item.description:
PLEASE NOTE THAT THE DINNER PART OF THIS HAS BEEN CANCELLED.

 

Sakura Tokyo is supposed to be one of the best restaurants in Worcester County. If you’re not a sushi eater – not to worry. There are so many other choices – from Hibachi Grill to Filet Mignon..   Let’s meet for dinner at 7pm.  We’ll have plenty of time to eat and socialize before the music starts. This is going to be a great time! There’s NO Cover charge and NO ALIBI rocks! Between the food and music, a perfect way to wind down the week. (If you can't make it for dinner, then come later for the music!) Mo will be organizing and co-hosting this event!  

+++++++++++++++++++++

Live music and dancing with No Alibi at Sakura Tokyo in Worcester.

No cover charge!

This will be our first time playing at Sakura. Looking forward to making many new friends there.

www.noalibirocks.com

Sakura Tokyo
640 Park Ave
Worcester, MA
(508) 792-1068
item.name: Music with No Alibi @ Sakura Tokyo
